name: NightShift One BETA
description:
NightShift One is inspired by Scott Cawthon's FNAF series. (this is not fnaf, but fnaf inspired, pizzeria simulator/ultimate custom night to be exact.)

The game is about a security guard doing tasks in his office while defending himself from the enemies of an old pizza place.(lore is a work in progress)

NightShift One is created by ncg_

How to Play

may change with upcoming updates

Monitor - flipping up your monitor may show some tasks for you to do.

Vent - decreases your temperature.

Left and Right Doors - to stop the enemies from trying to attack you

Main Mechanics

-Your night will end once you have done enough tasks

-You will die if your temperature stays at 50 degrees for too long

-The enemies will attack you if you leave your doors open for too long after their growl.

-You will die once your battery reaches 0%

reload the page if you see any bugs, it should fix it. If not, let me know.
